subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5225 is on the way
description_text:
The tracking number won't work. Has been I while since I paid.

Linimberg Photography

conversations.body_text: Hi Linimberg Oliveira,  I can see that the pedals and handbrake have already been delivered. The VAM Pro may be temporarily out of stock and should be shipped within the next few days.

I was very excited to have it all installed at once in my rig, and now I'm very disappointed with the way you sell and ship your products. You should let the buyers know that you don't have it in stock before you sell it, also why don't ship all at once? Since you are on the sim racing business,  you should know how hard it is to be moving and install it parts on the rig.Now I have my concerns how you guys would handle if I have any problems that need to addressed 
Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

Hi Linimberg Oliveira,  I apologize for the delayed response.  Due to a sudden surge in orders recently, I was unable to respond promptly.   I have confirmed that your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=887407230291,SF6047201467824,JSELS2651834757YQ,SF6047224438484
